NUM_LINES_TEST_MESSAGE.message: There {numLines, plural, =0 {are no lines} =1 {is one line} other {are # lines}}.

TOOLTIP_USER.description: tooltip for a user info tab

TOOLTIP_SHOW_USAGEEXAMPLES.description: tooltop for word usage examples button

TOOLTIP_NOT_AVAIL_POSTFIX.description: A postix added to tooltips when they are not available

PLACEHOLDER_DEFINITIONS.message: Lookup a word to show definitions...

PLACEHOLDER_INFLECT_IN_PROGRESS.message: Lookup a word to show inflections...

LABEL_INFLECT_SHOWFULL.description: label for expand button on inflections panel

LABEL_INFLECT_COLLAPSE.description: label for collapse table button on inflections panel

TOOLTIP_INFLECT_SHOWFULL.message: This table has been collapsed to show only columns with matching endings. Click 'Expand' to see the full table
TOOLTIP_INFLECT_SHOWFULL.description: tooltip for show full table button on inflections panel

TOOLTIP_INFLECT_COLLAPSE.message: This table shows all its columns. Click 'Collapse' to show the ones with matching endings only
TOOLTIP_INFLECT_COLLAPSE.description: tooltip for collapse table button on inflections panel

LABEL_INFLECT_HIDEEMPTY.description: label for hide empty columns button on inflections panel

LABEL_INFLECT_SHOWEMPTY.description: label for show empty columns button on inflections panel

TOOLTIP_INFLECT_HIDEEMPTY.description: tooltip for hide empty columns button on inflections panel

TOOLTIP_INFLECT_SHOWEMPTY.description: tooltip for show empty columns button on inflections panel

INFLECT_MSG_TABLE_NOT_IMPLEMENTED.message: This table has not been implemented yet
INFLECT_MSG_TABLE_NOT_IMPLEMENTED.description: tooltip to show instead of inflection table if the latter is not implemented

TEXT_INFO_ACTIVATE.message: Click on the Alpheios icon in the browser toolbar to turn the Alpheios tools on and off.

TEXT_INFO_CLICK.message: Double-click on a word to see lemmas, morphology, short definitions and icons for additional resources, such as long definitions, and, when available, inflection tables, usage examples, and sentence diagrams.

TEXT_INFO_LOOKUP.message: Opens a lookup box in which you can enter any word to see its lemmas, morphology etc, just as if you had double-clicked on it in a text. Note that you can change the language in which the word will be searched.

TEXT_INFO_LANGDETECT.message: If a web page identifies its language, Alpheios will use that language, otherwise it will use its default language - initially set to Latin. You can change this default in the settings options.

LABEL_INFO_CURRENTLANGUAGE.description: label for current language in info text

TEXT_INFO_TOOLBAR.message: Shows a series of icons for other resources, including browsable inflection tables and grammars, setting options, and, if you have logged in, your word lists and profile.

TEXT_INFO_ARROW.message: Moves this panel from side to side of your browser window.

LABEL_POPUP_TREEBANK.description: label for treebank button on popup

LABEL_POPUP_INFLECT.description: label for inflect button on popup

LABEL_POPUP_OPTIONS.description: label for options button on popup

LABEL_POPUP_DEFINE.description: label for define button on popup

LABEL_POPUP_USAGEEXAMPLES.description: label for usage examples button on popup

PLACEHOLDER_NO_LANGUAGE_DATA.message: Lexical data couldn't be populated because page language is not defined
PLACEHOLDER_NO_LANGUAGE_DATA.description: placeholder text for popup data when language is not defined

LABEL_POPUP_SHOWCREDITS.description: label for show credits link on popup

LABEL_POPUP_HIDECREDITS.description: label for hide credits link on popup

TEXT_NOTICE_SUGGEST_LOGIN.message: Login to save your words to your wordlist.

TEXT_NOTICE_CHANGE_LANGUAGE.message: '{targetWord}' was not found in our {languageName} resources. Wrong language? Change to:

TEXT_NOTICE_NOT_FOUND.message: '{targetWord}' was not found in our {languageName} resources.

TEXT_NOTICE_MORPHDATA_NOTFOUND.message: Morphological data not found. Definition queries pending.

TEXT_NOTICE_DEFSDATA_NOTFOUND.message: {requestType} request failed. Lemma not found for: "{word}"

TEXT_NOTICE_NO_DEFS_FOUND.description: displayed by the morph compoennt when there are no definition data exist

TEXT_NOTICE_DATA_RETRIEVAL_IN_PROGRESS.message: Please wait while data is retrieved ...

TEXT_NOTICE_RESOURCE_RETRIEVAL_IN_PROGRE.message: Please wait while data is retrieved ...

LABEL_CTXTMENU_SENDEXP.description: send exp data context menu label

LABEL_TOOLS_CONTROL.description: A tooltip for the reading tools icon on the toolbar

LABEL_LOOKUP_CONTROL.description: A tooltip for the button that turns the lookup panel on and off

LABEL_LOOKUP_CHANGE_LANGUAGE.description: change language link label in lookup.vue

TOOLTIP_LOOKUP_BUTTON.description: Tooltip for the lookup button in lookup.vue

LABEL_LOOKUP_SETTINGS.description: Settings link-label in the lookup block in lookup.vue

INFLECTIONS_CREDITS_TITLE.description: Title of credits section on inflection tables panel

INFLECTIONS_PARADIGMS_EXPLANATORY_HINT.description: A hint that indicates that the current table is representative pattern for verbs similar to the one chosen

INFLECTIONS_MAIN_TABLE_LINK_TEXT.description: A link pointing to a main inflection table

INFL_ATTRIBUTE_LINK_TEXT_SOURCE.description: A link pointing to the source of a lemma or inflection

EMBED_LIB_WARNING_TEXT.message: This pages embeds Alpheios directly. The Alpheios browser extension is not needed for it and will be deactivated until you navigate away from the page.
EMBED_LIB_WARNING_TEXT.description: A message that is shown when an Alpheios extension is disabled due to embedded library presence

AUTH_LOGIN_BTN_LABEL.description: A message shown on a log in button

AUTH_LOGOUT_BTN_LABEL.description: A message shown on a log out button

AUTH_LOGIN_PROGRESS_MSG.message: Please be patient while we are logging you in ...
AUTH_LOGIN_PROGRESS_MSG.description: A message shown to the user while he or she is waiting for an authentication to complete

AUTH_LOGIN_SUCCESS_MSG.message: Congratulations! You are logged in successfully.
AUTH_LOGIN_SUCCESS_MSG.description: A message shown to the user if he or she logged in successfully

AUTH_LOGIN_AUTH_FAILURE_MSG.description: A message shown to the user if his or her authentication failed

AUTH_SESSION_EXPIRED_MSG.message: Your user session has expired. Please log in again.
AUTH_SESSION_EXPIRED_MSG.description: A message shown to the user if his or her authentication session has been expired

AUTH_PROFILE_NICKNAME_LABEL.description: A user's profile nickname filed label

AUTH_PROFILE_NAME_LABEL.description: A user's profile name filed label

AUTH_LOGOUT_SUCCESS_MSG.description: A message shown to the user if he or she logged out successfully
